body:
There are other places in Tensorflow unit tests where unsetenv is being used to ensure we are checking the default paths (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a3d90a967e3c1c8d93928ca6620bbfa2fc8ce3a1/tensorflow/core/platform/cloud/google_auth_provider_test.cc#L71).

Do you have an alternative that I could look into?
